code: import React from'react';import{useGlobalContext}from'../context/AppContext';import'../assets/css/nav.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Nav=_ref=>{let{setCurrentSection}=_ref;const{sections}=useGlobalContext();const handleClick=section=>{setCurrentSection(section);window.location.hash="#".concat(section);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"nav justify-content-center custom-nav",children:sections.map((section,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"nav-link",href:"#".concat(section),onClick:()=>handleClick(section),children:section})},"".concat(section,"-").concat(index)))})});};export default Nav;
